subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Carolina Hurricanes signed their first-round draft pick, Zach Boychuk, to a three-year entry contract worth more than $2.6 million at the N.H.L. level. Boychuk will make $787,500 a season in the N.H.L. or $65,000 at the minor league level. He also received a $262,500 signing bonus. The Hurricanes took Boychuk, a 19-year-old center, with the 14th overall pick in the June draft.
